text: companies are collecting and processing
vast trobes of data about their
equipment and facilities from sources
like equipment sensors video cameras and
business applications many companies
want to combine this disparate data to
create a virtual representation of their
physical systems call the digital twin
to help them optimize industrial
operations increase production output
and improve equipment performance
building and managing digital twins can
be time consuming and costly but it
doesn't have to be
introducing aws iot twin maker aws iot
twin maker makes it faster and easier to
create digital twins model real world
systems by connecting to different data
sources like time series sensor data
from equipment video feeds from cameras
and maintenance history from business
applications
build a digital twin graph that
understands the relationships and
context among the data sources and bring
it all together in a 3d application of
your physical environment that displays
data and insights with spatial context
helping your operators make better
data-driven decisions try aws iot twin
maker today to realize the potential of
digital twins with an immersive view of
your facilities to learn more visit our
website
